alert.note: Alert for Lee (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 11 at 6:39PM EDT until June 11 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 268 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN TENNESSEE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN EAST TENNESSEE ANDERSON CAMPBELL CLAIBORNE HANCOCK MORGAN SCOTT UNION IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHWEST VIRGINIA LEE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ARTHUR, BIG SOUTH FORK NATIONAL, CARYVILLE, CLAIRFIELD, CLINTON, ELGIN, ELK VALLEY, EVANSTON, FINCASTLE, HARROGATE-SHAWANEE, HIGH POINT, HOWARD QUARTER, HUNTSVILLE, JELLICO, KYLES FORD, LA FOLLETTE, LONE MOUNTAIN, LUTTRELL, MAYNARDVILLE, NORMA, NORRIS LAKE, OAK RIDGE, ONEIDA, PAULETTE, PETROS, PINE ORCHARD, ROSE HILL, ROSE HILL, ROYAL BLUE, SANDLICK, SHARPS CHAPEL, SLICK ROCK, SMOKEY JUNCTION, SNEEDVILLE, SPRINGDALE, TREADWAY, AND WHITE OAK.
